SRI.T.P.SAJAN SRI.M.MOHAMED NAVAZ SRI.P.SANTHOSH KUMAR (TR) THIS CRIMINAL MISC. I, FIR ANNEXURE 3:TRUE COPY OF RELEVANT PAGES OF DIRECTIONS AND GUIDELINES OF ERNAKULAM CHURCH ADMINISTRATION BYE LAW ON GRAVE ANNEXURE 4:TRUE COPY OF PLAINT IN OS.NO.393/2012 OF THE MUNSIFF'S COURT, ALUVA ANNEXURE 5:TRUE COPY OF APPLICATION MADE BY 1ST ACCUSED TO VICAR, ST. MARY'S CHURCH MUKKANNOOR ANNEXURE 6:TRUE COPY OF COMMUNICATION DATED 05.05.2015 ISSUED BY THE VICAR OF ST.MARY'S FORANE CHURCH, MOOKKANNOOR ANNEXURE 7:TRUE COPY OF ORDER DATED 22.01.2016 OF THE HON'BLE HIGH COURT IN CRL.MC.NO.4651/2015 ANNEXUURE 8:TRUE COPY OF FINAL REPORT AND THE ACCOMPANYING DOCUMENTS FILED IN CRIME NO.172/2015 OF ANGAMALY POLICE STATION RESPONDENTS ANNEXURES NIL / TRUE COPY/ PA TO JUDGE sdr/- 2018/KER/476 B. KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 5" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioners are A2, A3, A4 and A6 in CC No.1979/2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Angamaly, based on Annexure-8 final report in Crime No.172/2015 of Angamaly Police Station for the offences punishable under Sections 297 and 201 read with Section 34 IPC. 2. On going through the allegations in the final report, it has come out that the offence under Section 297 IPC cannot be attracted. As far as the offence under Section 201 IPC is concerned, when the other offence cannot be attracted, there cannot be an offence under Section 201 IPC also. Matters being so, the prosecution of the petitioners in the case is quite unnecessary and Repeal eine 2018/KER/476 Crl.M.C.1183/2016 :2: therefore, all further proceedings in CC No.1979/2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Angamaly, based on Annexure-8 final report in Crime No.172/2015_ of Angamaly Police Station are liable to be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and all further proceedings against the petitioners in CC No.1979/2015 of the Judicial First Class Magistrate's Court, Angamaly, based on Annexure-8 final report in Crime No.172/2015 of Angamaly Police Station, are quashed. Sd/- (B.KEMAL PASHA, JUDGE) aks/05/01 1! True Copy // PS to Judge
